sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Someone</radical> decided to build a bunch of <radical>building</radical>s and turn them into a <kanji>metropolis</kanji>. You don't know who they are, but now an absolute ton of other someones you don't know also live here in these buildings and work in this busy metropolis.
meaningInfo: Imagine just how many different someones live in this metropolis. There are so many people, you'll never meet them all!
readingMnemonic: You try to picture the faces of all the people who live in this <kanji>metropolis</kanji>, but for some reason you can only picture their <reading>toe</reading>s (<ja>と</ja>). And there are ten times as many toes in this city than someones.
readingInfo: If you think about it, every metropolis is completely jam-packed-full of toes. Just picture it. Toes. Everywhere. In every building. Filling up the streets.
